title: How can i create PBE account?
body: Can you tell me some way to sing up to PBE server-(make PBE acc.)-------Sry me english is bad.

replies.body: The PBE account page is currently down for extended maintenance.  It won't be possible to sign up or create an account until that's finished.  I don't have anymore detail on that, but bookmark our [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) to stay up to date.  I hope that helps clarify!
how much time we have to wait for create new account?
When will we be able to create an pbe account?
